# Task 3.5: Documentation

**Phase**: 3 (Polish, Integration & Deploy)  
**Complexity**: Medium  
**Status**: Not Started

## Description

Create comprehensive documentation for developers, users, and API consumers.

## Details

- API Documentation:
  - OpenAPI/Swagger specification (machine-readable)
  - Swagger UI for interactive exploration
  - Endpoint reference with parameters and responses
  - Example requests and responses for each endpoint
  - Error codes and meanings
  - Authentication/authorization notes
  - Rate limiting policy (if applicable)

- Configuration Guide:
  - `config.yml` reference with all options
  - Environment variable mappings
  - Example configurations for common scenarios
  - Validation rules and constraints
  - Default values documented
  - File location and permissions guidelines

- Deployment Guide:
  - Docker image usage and tags
  - docker-compose setup instructions
  - Database initialization
  - Environment variable configuration
  - Port mappings and network setup
  - Health check configuration
  - Logging and monitoring setup
  - Backup and recovery procedures

- User Guide:
  - CLI commands with examples for each subcommand
  - Common workflows (process, sync, query)
  - Filter creation and testing
  - Using the REST API with curl/Postman examples
  - Screen captures or diagrams of flows

- Architecture Documentation:
  - System architecture diagram
  - Data flow diagrams
  - Component responsibilities
  - Database schema diagram
  - Integration points with external systems

- Developer Guide:
  - Setup instructions for development
  - Project structure and package descriptions
  - Code style guidelines and conventions
  - Testing guidelines and best practices
  - Adding new features checklist
  - Debug instructions

- Troubleshooting Guide:
  - Common issues and solutions
  - Log interpretation
  - Performance tuning tips
  - Database connection issues
  - External API integration issues
  - Memory/CPU optimization

- Contributing Guidelines:
  - Pull request process
  - Code review checklist
  - Testing requirements
  - Documentation requirements
  - Commit message format

- README.md Update:
  - Quick-start instructions
  - Feature overview
  - Technology stack
  - Links to detailed documentation
  - License information
  - Support/contact information

## Dependencies

- All previous tasks (documentation aggregation)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] OpenAPI spec complete and valid
- [ ] Configuration guide covers all options
- [ ] Deployment guide sufficient for production use
- [ ] User guide covers all common workflows
- [ ] Architecture documentation includes diagrams
- [ ] Developer guide enables contributor onboarding
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide addresses 90%+ of likely issues
- [ ] README provides clear quick-start
- [ ] All documentation examples tested and working
